amendatorysection.chaptername: State Uni., State Colleges, and Post. Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Benefits received; effect on other student aid.
amendatorysection.para: A student loan program, student grant program, or other program administered by any agency of the state, except as may be otherwise provided by federal law or the provisions of any specific grant applicable to the federal law, shall not take into account and shall not consider amounts available for the payment of higher education costs pursuant to the Nebraska educational savings plan trust in determining need and eligibility for student aid.
